paintings.title: Memorial Composition
paintings.description: A powerful symbolic composition featuring the Star of David, family portraits, and architectural elements representing memory, heritage, and the enduring spirit. The ocean and dramatic sky create a contemplative backdrop for this meaningful tribute.

paintings.title: Mediterranean Alley
paintings.description: A charming street scene capturing the essence of old Mediterranean architecture with its characteristic turquoise and warm earth tones. The interplay of light and shadow creates depth and atmosphere.

paintings.title: The Matriarch
paintings.description: A dignified portrait of an elderly woman, painted with deep respect and attention to the wisdom etched in her features. The traditional headwrap and clothing speak to cultural heritage.

paintings.title: The Scholar
paintings.description: A contemplative study of an elderly Jewish man with his prayer book, capturing a moment of quiet devotion. The warm lighting and careful attention to facial details reflect years of wisdom and faith.
